name: Kami
greetingText: I love you! Apologies (not) for defeating you on your bday. You played well tho. A worthy opponent!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday babeeee! You are now a 25 year old gra...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Special. Btw, I was typing 25 year old gra-cious, sexy, smart and goofy hooman earlier, hehe
wishHeading: I hope you have the best year ahead! Sorry yaar, bohot try kiya cap tere sir pe daalne ka. Nahi hua bc, nahi hai coder tera bf.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
